name: ssrabi
params: setvar s0, class c0, wff w0, wff w1
body: |- wss(crab(s0, c0, w0), crab(s0, c0, w1))

body.origin:
|- wss(crab(s0, c0, w0), crab(s0, c0, w1))
-| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wi(w0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(crab(s0, c0, w0), crab(s0, c0, w1))
-| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wi(w0, w1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wi(w0, w1))
-| wi(w0, w1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(crab(s0, c0, w0), crab(s0, c0, w1))
-| wi(w0, w1)

comment: Inference of restricted abstraction subclass from implication. (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 26-Oct-2022.)
